name: Out of the Box Controls
description:
You can't move on your own, all you have is your view and your handy gun.

Control - Move the camera with you mouse and use the gun with LMB.

First Time Game Jammers, we've only been doing game related things a few months now and unfortuneatly only had time to implement one level and couldn't really polish it. 

We hope you enjoy the short demo of the game concept nonetheless

Regarding assets, we made everything ourselves, except for the gun, sound effects and ground texture.
